channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Active Choices Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Active Choices Plugin

item.title: CVE-2021-21616|2024-08-03T18:16:23.647Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20active%20choices%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Active Choices Plugin 2.5.2 and earlier does not escape reference parameter values, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Job/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2021-21699|2024-08-03T18:23:29.538Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20active%20choices%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Active Choices Plugin 2.5.6 and earlier does not escape the parameter name of reactive parameters and dynamic reference parameters, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Job/Configure permission.
